description:
With the spring of her third year of high school approaching, protagonist Kusanagi Yui one day hears a voice calling her from the shrine storehouse of her home.
Lured into the storehouse, she discovers a glowing sword.
The moment she touches the sword, Yui experiences a powerful shock that knocks her unconscious--
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 禁じられた箱庭[がくえん]
